description: Number of monic irreducible polynomials over GF(4) with zero trace.
comments: Also number of Lyndon words of length n with trace 0 over GF(4).
links: F. Ruskey, Number of monic irreducible polynomials over GF(q) with zero trace ...
F. Ruskey, Number of Lyndon words of given trace
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 18 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 19 2000
